Alien's Research on Humanity on Earth

We, Human are pretty advanced, only species who managed to develop Language, Technology, and complex social organization and has no competition on earth !

Purpose

We know very less or none about Death, this is one of the biggest reason not to understand Life. You can not understand right without outlining wrong, true without false and good without bad. Mysteries of death sparks piculier curiosity and fascination in me.

Why

It is with profound sadness that I myself taking pleasure to announce the Death of my beloved Me, Gaurav Gautam Shakya, World renowned Billionaire Businessman, Technologist who left the profound immutable legacy behind in the history of Technology and Business innovation. His Contribution to Technology and Engineering is unforgettable specific to Technology and innovation in Healthcare system of India. Lastly, I want to prostrate to my parents for making me existing. I wanna say Goodbye to everyone with whom I shared love of life.

Chapters

Preface

Introduction

One Accident, Invention or Discovery or what?

Type 1 - Problems: Intra-group Problems - People & Governance{" "}

Type 2 - Problems: Intra-group Problems - Internationalization

Type 3 - Problems: Cosmological & Environmental Wonders - The Religion

Type 4 - Problems: Hunam Problems - Agents of vulnerabilities, Love and compassion

Abstraction in Human problem space in current state of human regime

Conclusion

Future and Current trend of Human Engineering and Evolution

); } export default Research;
